meanings.definition: A complex and elaborate design of intertwined lines and shapes.
meanings.sent1: The artist created an arabesque of flowers and vines on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The intricate arabesque on the rug added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The arabesque of swirls and loops on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an arabesque of thoughts, weaving in and out of each other.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a colorful arabesque of blooms and leaves, a true masterpiece of nature.

meanings.definition: A ballet position in which the dancer stands on one leg with the other leg extended behind and the arms outstretched.
meanings.sent1: The ballerina gracefully performed an arabesque, balancing on one leg.
meanings.sent2: During the ballet recital, the dancers executed perfect arabesques on stage.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy dancer's attempt at an arabesque ended in a comical fall.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the dance floor were like a series of arabesques, flowing and elegant.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's arabesque was so flawless, it seemed like she was defying gravity.
